612020.name: Preservation
612020.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Preservation, dealing Physical DMG to all enemies based on the total Shield between all allies.
612020.shortDesc: After using the Path Resonance, deals Physical DMG to all enemies based on the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields on all allies.
612020.battleDesc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Preservation, dealing Physical DMG to all enemies based on the total Shield between all allies.

612021.name: Zero-Dimensional Reinforcement
612021.desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Preservation become CRIT Hits. For every Shielded character on the team, the CRIT DMG increases by **15%**.
612021.shortDesc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Preservation are guaranteed to CRIT. The more characters there are with Shields, the higher the CRIT DMG.
612021.battleDesc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Preservation become CRIT Hits. For every Shielded character on the team, the CRIT DMG increases by **15%**.

612022.name: Eutectic Reaction
612022.desc: When Path Resonance is used, all allies gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **1%** of their respective Max HP, for 2 turns, and **Amber** is applied to all allies at the same time.
612022.shortDesc: Applies a Shield and **Amber** to all characters after using a Path Resonance.
612022.battleDesc: When Path Resonance is used, all allies gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **1%** of their respective Max HP, for 2 turns, and **Amber** is applied to all allies at the same time.

612023.name: Isomorphous Reaction
612023.desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an ally gains a Shield, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **3%** Energy.
612023.shortDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. When a character gains Shield, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612023.battleDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an ally gains a Shield, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **3%** Energy.

612024.name: Spiked Armor
612024.desc: There is a **150%** base chance for Path Resonance: Preservation to inflict Bleed on the attacked target for **2** turn(s). Bleeding enemies will take Physical DoT equal to **12%** of their Max HP at the start of each turn. This DMG cannot exceed **250%** of the total amount of Shield effect currently active on all allies.
612024.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, there is a high chance of applying Bleed to the enemy. DMG dealt is based on the total Shield on all allies.

612025.name: Cold Snap
612025.desc: When attacking Frozen enemy targets with Path Resonance: Preservation, the DMG dealt increases by **80%** and the Freeze status on the enemy targets is removed. **Dissociation** will not be removed by this effect.
612025.shortDesc: Increases DMG dealt by Path Resonance: Preservation to Frozen enemies and dispels their Freeze status.

612030.name: Resonance Transfer
612030.desc: After a character launches an attack, deals **Quake** DMG equal to **100%** of the character's current Shield to the hit enemies.
612030.shortDesc: After attacking enemies, the attacking character deals **Quake** DMG based on the current Shield effect on the character.
612030.battleDesc: After a character launches an attack, deals **Quake** DMG equal to **100%** of the character's current Shield to the hit enemies.
612030.desc2: After a character launches an attack, deals **Quake** DMG equal to **100%** of the character's current Shield effect plus **20%** of the total Shield effect of the character's allies to the hit enemies.
612030.shortDesc2: After attacking enemies, the attacking character deals **Quake** DMG based on the current total Shield effect on the ally team.
612030.battleDesc2: After a character launches an attack, deals **Quake** DMG equal to **100%** of the character's current Shield effect plus **20%** of the total Shield effect of the character's allies to the hit enemies.

612031.name: Metastatic Field
612031.desc: After a character is hit, deals **Quake** DMG to the attacker, equal to **340%** of the character's current Shield effect. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
612031.shortDesc: After a character is hit by an attack, deals **Quake** DMG based on the current Shield effect on the attacked character.
612031.battleDesc: After a character is hit, deals **Quake** DMG to the attacker, equal to **340%** of the character's current Shield effect. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
612031.desc2: After a character is attacked, deals **Quake** DMG to the attacker, equal to **420%** of the character's Shield effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
612031.shortDesc2: After a character is hit by an attack, deals **Quake** DMG on the attacking enemy based on the total Shield effect on the character before they were hit.
612031.battleDesc2: After a character is attacked, deals **Quake** DMG to the attacker, equal to **420%** of the character's Shield effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.

612032.name: Macrosegregation
612032.desc: At the start of the battle, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **1%** of their Max HP. Whenever another Shield is gained, this special Shield will also strengthen in equal value. For every **2** turn(s), this will be removed, and then this special Shield can be regained.
612032.shortDesc: When entering battle, characters gain a stackable special Shield. This Shield is reset every **2** turn(s).
612032.battleDesc: At the start of the battle, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **1%** of their Max HP. Whenever another Shield is gained, this special Shield will also strengthen in equal value. For every **2** turn(s), this will be removed, and then this special Shield can be regained.
612032.desc2: At the start of the battle, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **10%** of their Max HP. Whenever another Shield is gained, this special Shield will also strengthen by **130%**. For every **2** turn(s), this will be removed, and then this special Shield can be regained.
612032.shortDesc2: When entering battle, characters gain a stackable special Shield. This Shield is reset every **2** turn(s).
612032.battleDesc2: At the start of the battle, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **10%** of their Max HP. Whenever another Shield is gained, this special Shield will also strengthen by **130%**. For every **2** turn(s), this will be removed, and then this special Shield can be regained.

612040.name: Shear Structure
612040.desc: Characters deal **10%** increased **Quake** DMG to their target enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also take **Quake** DMG equal to **25%** of DMG dealt to the target enemy.
612040.shortDesc: **Quake** DMG increases and affects enemies adjacent to the target enemy.
612040.battleDesc: Characters deal **10%** increased **Quake** DMG to their target enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also take **Quake** DMG equal to **25%** of DMG dealt to the target enemy.
612040.desc2: Characters deal **15%** increased **Quake** DMG to their target, and other targets also take **Quake** DMG equal to **30%** of DMG dealt to the target enemy.
612040.shortDesc2: **Quake** DMG increases and is Blasted to all enemies.
612040.battleDesc2: Characters deal **15%** increased **Quake** DMG to their target, and other targets also take **Quake** DMG equal to **30%** of DMG dealt to the target enemy.

612041.name: Burst Lattice
612041.desc: When a character deals **Quake** DMG to an enemy target, there is a **65%** base chance to cause the target to Bleed.
612041.shortDesc: **Quake** has a chance of applying Bleed on the enemy.
612041.battleDesc: When a character deals **Quake** DMG to an enemy target, there is a **65%** base chance to cause the target to Bleed.
612041.desc2: When a character deals **Quake** DMG to an enemy target, there is a **100%** base chance to cause the target to Bleed.
612041.shortDesc2: **Quake** has a high chance of applying Bleed to enemies.
612041.battleDesc2: When a character deals **Quake** DMG to an enemy target, there is a **100%** base chance to cause the target to Bleed.

612042.name: Solid Solution
612042.desc: Deals increased **Quake** DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to **80%** of the character's current DEF.
612042.shortDesc: The DMG **Quake** deals increases with the character's DEF.
612042.battleDesc: Deals increased **Quake** DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to **80%** of the character's current DEF.
612042.desc2: Deals increased **Quake** DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to **120%** of the character's current DEF.
612042.shortDesc2: The DMG **Quake** deals increases with the character's DEF.
612042.battleDesc2: Deals increased **Quake** DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to **120%** of the character's current DEF.

612043.name: Safe Load
612043.desc: Shielded characters increase their ATK by **40%** of the Shield effect on them, up to a maximum of **120%** of their Base ATK.
612043.shortDesc: Shielded characters increase their ATK based on the max DMG that can be absorbed by their current Shields.
612043.battleDesc: Shielded characters increase their ATK by **40%** of the Shield effect on them, up to a maximum of **120%** of their Base ATK.
612043.desc2: Shielded characters increase their ATK by **60%** of the Shield effect on them, up to a maximum of **160%** of their Base ATK.
612043.shortDesc2: Shielded characters increase their ATK based on the max DMG that can be absorbed by their current Shields.
612043.battleDesc2: Shielded characters increase their ATK by **60%** of the Shield effect on them, up to a maximum of **160%** of their Base ATK.

612044.name: Sanctuary
612044.desc: At the end of the turn, there is **80%** fixed chance for characters to gain a Shield equal to **12%** of their Max HP, lasting for **1** turn(s).
612044.shortDesc: Characters have a high chance of receiving a Shield at the end of the turn.
612044.battleDesc: At the end of the turn, there is **80%** fixed chance for characters to gain a Shield equal to **12%** of their Max HP, lasting for **1** turn(s).
612044.desc2: At the end of the turn, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **15%** of their Max HP, lasting for **1** turn(s).
612044.shortDesc2: Characters receive a Shield at the end of the turn.
612044.battleDesc2: At the end of the turn, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **15%** of their Max HP, lasting for **1** turn(s).

612045.name: Quadrangular Pyramid
612045.desc: Increase the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields created by characters by **30%**.
612045.shortDesc: Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields created by characters.
612045.battleDesc: Increase the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields created by characters by **30%**.
612045.desc2: When characters' gain a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield by **35%**.
612045.shortDesc2: When a character receives a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield.
612045.battleDesc2: When characters' gain a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield by **35%**.

612046.name: Hypoeutectoid
612046.desc: When a character provides Shields to allies, this character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **24%** of the provided Shield for **2** turn(s).
612046.shortDesc: Characters also receive a Shield when creating Shield(s) for allied targets.
612046.battleDesc: When a character provides Shields to allies, this character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **24%** of the provided Shield for **2** turn(s).
612046.desc2: When a character provides Shields to allies, this character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **36%** of the provided Shield for **2** turn(s).
612046.shortDesc2: Characters also receive a Shield when creating Shield(s) for allied targets.
612046.battleDesc2: When a character provides Shields to allies, this character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **36%** of the provided Shield for **2** turn(s).

612050.name: Assemble
612050.desc: Characters gain a **6%** DEF increase for each Preservation Blessing, stacking up to a max of **6** time(s).
612050.shortDesc: The more Blessings of Preservation the team has, the higher the characters' DEF becomes.
612050.battleDesc: Characters gain a **6%** DEF increase for each Preservation Blessing, stacking up to a max of **6** time(s).
612050.desc2: Characters gain a **8%** DEF increase for each Preservation Blessing, stacking up to a max of **9** time(s).
612050.shortDesc2: The more Blessings of Preservation the team has, the higher the characters' DEF becomes.
612050.battleDesc2: Characters gain a **8%** DEF increase for each Preservation Blessing, stacking up to a max of **9** time(s).

612051.name: Sentinel
612051.desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to **16%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612051.shortDesc: When entering battle, all characters gain a Shield.
612051.battleDesc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to **16%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612051.desc2: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to **24%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612051.shortDesc2: Upon entering battle, all characters gain a Shield.
612051.battleDesc2: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to **24%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).

612052.name: Patch
612052.desc: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for **1** turn(s).
612052.shortDesc: After being hit, characters gain a Shield based on the HP lost in this attack.
612052.battleDesc: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for **1** turn(s).
612052.desc2: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612052.shortDesc2: After being hit, characters gain a Shield based on the HP lost in this attack.
612052.battleDesc2: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for **2** turn(s).

612053.name: Compensation
612053.desc: After applying Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **14%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612053.shortDesc: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on a target, the character gains a Shield.
612053.battleDesc: After applying Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **14%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612053.desc2: After applying Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of their Max HP, lasting for **3** turn(s).
612053.shortDesc2: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on a target, the character gains a Shield.
612053.battleDesc2: After applying Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of their Max HP, lasting for **3** turn(s).

612055.name: Rotation
612055.desc: When a character gains a Shield, there is a **20%** fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.
612055.shortDesc: When a character receives a shield, there is a small chance of removing a debuff currently on them.
612055.battleDesc: When a character gains a Shield, there is a **20%** fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.
612055.desc2: When a character gains a Shield, there is a **30%** fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.
612055.shortDesc2: When a character receives a Shield, there is a small chance of removing a debuff currently on them.
612055.battleDesc2: When a character gains a Shield, there is a **30%** fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.

612056.name: Burst
612056.desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by **30%**.
612056.shortDesc: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT DMG.
612056.battleDesc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by **30%**.
612056.desc2: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by **45%**.
612056.shortDesc2: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT DMG.
612056.battleDesc2: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by **45%**.

612057.name: Concentration
612057.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by **16%**.
612057.shortDesc: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT Rate.
612057.battleDesc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by **16%**.
612057.desc2: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by **24%**.
612057.shortDesc2: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT Rate.
612057.battleDesc2: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by **24%**.

612120.name: Remembrance
612120.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemies with a **120%** base chance to Freeze all enemies for **1** turn(s).
612120.shortDesc: After using Path Resonance, deals Ice DMG to all enemies with a high chance of Freezing them.
612120.battleDesc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemies with a **120%** base chance to Freeze all enemies for **1** turn(s).

612121.name: Total Recall
612121.desc: When Path Resonance is used, there is a **150%** base chance to decrease enemies' chance to resist Frozen by **100%** for **1** turn(s).
612121.shortDesc: When using Path Resonance, there is a high chance of reducing all enemies' Freeze RES.
612121.battleDesc: When Path Resonance is used, there is a **150%** base chance to decrease enemies' chance to resist Frozen by **100%** for **1** turn(s).

612122.name: Rich Experience
612122.desc: When using Path Resonance, there is a **150%** base chance to apply **Eonian River** to all enemies for 1 turn.
612122.shortDesc: After using Path Resonance, there is a high chance to apply **Eonian River** to all enemies.
612122.battleDesc: When using Path Resonance, there is a **150%** base chance to apply **Eonian River** to all enemies for 1 turn.

612123.name: First Love Once More
612123.desc: Upon battle entrance, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an enemy becomes Frozen, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **5%** Energy.
612123.shortDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. When an enemy becomes Frozen, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612123.battleDesc: Upon battle entrance, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an enemy becomes Frozen, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **5%** Energy.

612124.name: Faces Places
612124.desc: When the Freeze effect caused by Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted by enemy targets, there is a **150%** base chance of lowering the target's All-Type RES by **15%** for **2** turn(s). For every 1% HP that each ally has lost, the target's All-Type RES is additionally lowered by **0%**.
612124.shortDesc: When the Freeze effect of a Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted, reduces the enemy target(s)' All-Type RES based on the total lost HP of all team members.

612125.name: Landscape in the Mist
612125.desc: When the Freeze effect caused by Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted by enemy targets, there is a **150%** base chance of decreasing the target's SPD by **15%** for **2** turn(s).
612125.shortDesc: When the Freeze effect of a Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted, there is a high chance of reducing the enemy's SPD.

612130.name: Fuli
612130.desc: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a **100%** base chance to inflict **Dissociation** for **1** turn(s).
612130.shortDesc: After attacking a Frozen enemy, apply **Dissociation** on them.
612130.battleDesc: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a **100%** base chance to inflict **Dissociation** for **1** turn(s).
612130.desc2: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** to the enemy for **1** turn(s). DMG dealt when **Dissociation** is removed +**20%**.
612130.shortDesc2: After attacking a Frozen enemy, apply **Dissociation** on them and deal extra DMG.
612130.battleDesc2: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** to the enemy for **1** turn(s). DMG dealt when **Dissociation** is removed +**20%**.

612131.name: Innocence
612131.desc: After a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** on the enemy for **1** turn(s).
612131.shortDesc: After Breaking an enemy's Weakness, apply **Dissociation** on them.
612131.battleDesc: After a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** on the enemy for **1** turn(s).
612131.desc2: After the character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** on the enemy for **1** turn(s). This effect ignores enemies' chance to resist Frozen.
612131.shortDesc2: After a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, ignore the enemy's Freeze RES and apply **Dissociation** on them.
612131.battleDesc2: After the character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** on the enemy for **1** turn(s). This effect ignores enemies' chance to resist Frozen.

612132.name: Reticence
612132.desc: After an enemy is attacked **6** time(s), they have a **120%** base chance to become Frozen for **1** turn(s).
612132.shortDesc: The enemy has a high chance to become Frozen for every **6** attack(s) it receives.
612132.battleDesc: After an enemy is attacked **6** time(s), they have a **120%** base chance to become Frozen for **1** turn(s).
612132.desc2: After an enemy is attacked **5** time(s), they have a **150%** base chance to become Frozen for **1** turn(s).
612132.shortDesc2: The enemy has a high chance to become Frozen for every **5** attack(s) it receives.
612132.battleDesc2: After an enemy is attacked **5** time(s), they have a **150%** base chance to become Frozen for **1** turn(s).

612140.name: Melancholia
612140.desc: Attacking an enemy with **Dissociation** will remove **Dissociation**, and deal DMG equal to **150%** of the **Dissociation** removal DMG.
612140.shortDesc: When a character attacks an enemy with **Dissociation**, remove **Dissociation** from the enemy and increase the DMG received when this status is removed.
612140.battleDesc: Attacking an enemy with **Dissociation** will remove **Dissociation**, and deal DMG equal to **150%** of the **Dissociation** removal DMG.
612140.desc2: Attacking an enemy with **Dissociation** will remove **Dissociation**, and deal DMG equal to **200%** of the **Dissociation** removal DMG.
612140.shortDesc2: When a character attacks an enemy with **Dissociation**, remove **Dissociation** from the enemy and increase the DMG received when this status is removed.
612140.battleDesc2: Attacking an enemy with **Dissociation** will remove **Dissociation**, and deal DMG equal to **200%** of the **Dissociation** removal DMG.

612141.name: Dizziness
612141.desc: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with **Dissociation** by **36%**. This effect will remain for 1 turn after **Dissociation** is removed.
612141.battleDesc: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with **Dissociation** by **36%**. This effect will remain for 1 turn after **Dissociation** is removed.
612141.desc2: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with **Dissociation** by **54%**. This effect will remain for 1 turn after **Dissociation** is removed.
612141.battleDesc2: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with **Dissociation** by **54%**. This effect will remain for 1 turn after **Dissociation** is removed.

612142.name: Insensitivity
612142.desc: After **Dissociation** is removed from an enemy, there is a **50%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).
612142.shortDesc: When **Dissociation** is removed from an enemy, there is a chance for them to become Frozen.
612142.battleDesc: After **Dissociation** is removed from an enemy, there is a **50%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).
612142.desc2: After **Dissociation** is removed from an enemy, there is a **75%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).
612142.shortDesc2: After **Dissociation** is removed from an enemy, there is a high chance for them to become Frozen.
612142.battleDesc2: After **Dissociation** is removed from an enemy, there is a **75%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).

612143.name: Sentimentality
612143.desc: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, enemies adjacent to it also receive DMG equal to **20%** of the DMG taken by the target enemy.
612143.shortDesc: Ice DMG taken by enemies can affect enemies adjacent to the target enemy.
612143.battleDesc: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, enemies adjacent to it also receive DMG equal to **20%** of the DMG taken by the target enemy.
612143.desc2: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, all other enemies also receive DMG equal to **24%** of the DMG taken by the target enemy.
612143.shortDesc2: Ice DMG dealt to an enemy can be Blasted to all enemies.
612143.battleDesc2: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, all other enemies also receive DMG equal to **24%** of the DMG taken by the target enemy.

612144.name: Indelibility
612144.desc: When a character deals DMG to an enemy, there's a **2%** base chance to Freeze the hit enemy for **1** turn(s).
612144.shortDesc: When characters deal DMG to enemies, there is a small chance to Freeze the enemy.
612144.battleDesc: When a character deals DMG to an enemy, there's a **2%** base chance to Freeze the hit enemy for **1** turn(s).
612144.desc2: Enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by **20%**. When a character deals DMG to an enemy, there is a **3%** base chance to Freeze the hit enemy for **1** turn(s).
612144.shortDesc2: Reduce the enemy's Freeze RES. When characters deal DMG to enemies, there is a small chance to Freeze the enemy.
612144.battleDesc2: Enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by **20%**. When a character deals DMG to an enemy, there is a **3%** base chance to Freeze the hit enemy for **1** turn(s).

612145.name: Shudder
612145.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a **70%** base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy for **2** turn(s).
612145.shortDesc: After a character uses their Ultimate, a random enemy gains Ice Weakness.
612145.battleDesc: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a **70%** base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy for **2** turn(s).
612145.desc2: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a **70%** base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy who has no Ice Weakness for **2** turn(s).
612145.shortDesc2: After a character uses their Ultimate, a random enemy without Ice Weakness gains Ice Weakness.
612145.battleDesc2: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a **70%** base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy who has no Ice Weakness for **2** turn(s).

612146.name: Maverick
612146.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a **150%** base chance for all enemies to become Frozen for **1** turn(s).
612146.shortDesc: Upon entering battle, there is a high chance of inflicting Freeze on all enemies.
612146.battleDesc: Upon entering battle, there is a **150%** base chance for all enemies to become Frozen for **1** turn(s).
612146.desc2: Upon entering battle, there is a **150%** base chance for all enemies to become Frozen and have their SPD reduced by **30%**, lasting for **1** turn(s).
612146.shortDesc2: Upon entering battle, there is a high chance of inflicting Freeze on all enemy units, as well as lowering their SPD.
612146.battleDesc2: Upon entering battle, there is a **150%** base chance for all enemies to become Frozen and have their SPD reduced by **30%**, lasting for **1** turn(s).

612150.name: Unspeakable Shame
612150.desc: For every Blessing of Remembrance the team has, enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by **6%**, stacking up to **6** time(s).
612150.shortDesc: The more Blessings of Remembrance the team has, the lower the enemy's Freeze RES become.
612150.battleDesc: For every Blessing of Remembrance the team has, enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by **6%**, stacking up to **6** time(s).
612150.desc2: For every Blessing of Remembrance the team has, enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by **8%**, stacking up to **9** time(s).
612150.shortDesc2: The more Blessings of Remembrance the team has, the lower the enemy's Freeze RES become.
612150.battleDesc2: For every Blessing of Remembrance the team has, enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by **8%**, stacking up to **9** time(s).

612151.name: The Torment of Alienation
612151.desc: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by **16%**.
612151.battleDesc: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by **16%**.
612151.desc2: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by **24%**.
612151.battleDesc2: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by **24%**.

612152.name: Lost Memory
612152.desc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP to a point that is lower than **50%** for the first time in this battle, there's a **70%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).
612152.shortDesc: Enemies have a chance of becoming Frozen when they fall to low health from characters' attacks.
612152.battleDesc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP to a point that is lower than **50%** for the first time in this battle, there's a **70%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).
612152.desc2: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP to a point that is lower than **50%** for the first time in this battle, there's a **100%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).
612152.shortDesc2: Enemies have a high chance of becoming Frozen when they fall to low HP from allies' attacks.
612152.battleDesc2: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP to a point that is lower than **50%** for the first time in this battle, there's a **100%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).

612153.name: Stone Cold Hatred
612153.desc: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by **36%**.
612153.shortDesc: Characters' Skill and Ultimate deal increased DMG against Frozen enemies.
612153.battleDesc: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by **36%**.
612153.desc2: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by **54%**.
612153.shortDesc2: Characters' Skill and Ultimate deal increased DMG against Frozen enemies.
612153.battleDesc2: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by **54%**.

612154.name: Pain & Suffering
612154.desc: Right after an enemy is Frozen, the next **1** attack(s) launched against the said enemy will have **100%** increased CRIT Rate. This effect is dispelled when the Frozen state is removed.
612154.shortDesc: After an enemy is Frozen, the next **1** attack(s) they receive are guaranteed to CRIT.
612154.battleDesc: Right after an enemy is Frozen, the next **1** attack(s) launched against the said enemy will have **100%** increased CRIT Rate. This effect is dispelled when the Frozen state is removed.
612154.desc2: Right after an enemy is Frozen, the next **2** attack(s) launched against the said enemy will have **100%** increased CRIT Rate. This effect is dispelled when the Frozen state is removed.
612154.shortDesc2: After an enemy is Frozen, the next **2** attack(s) they receive are guaranteed to CRIT.
612154.battleDesc2: Right after an enemy is Frozen, the next **2** attack(s) launched against the said enemy will have **100%** increased CRIT Rate. This effect is dispelled when the Frozen state is removed.

612155.name: Primordial Hardship
612155.desc: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by **16%**.
612155.shortDesc: DMG taken by Frozen enemies increases.
612155.battleDesc: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by **16%**.
612155.desc2: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by **24%**.
612155.shortDesc2: DMG taken by Frozen enemies increases.
612155.battleDesc2: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by **24%**.

612156.name: Thrill of Escalation
612156.desc: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates **8** Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.
612156.shortDesc: Characters regenerate Energy when they apply Freeze on enemies.
612156.battleDesc: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates **8** Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.
612156.desc2: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates **12** Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.
612156.shortDesc2: Characters regenerate Energy when they apply Freeze on enemies.
612156.battleDesc2: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates **12** Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.

612157.name: Responsive Excitement
612157.desc: When a character applies Freeze to an enemy, the character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **16%** of their Max HP for **3** turn(s).
612157.shortDesc: Characters gain a Shield when they apply Freeze on enemies.
612157.battleDesc: When a character applies Freeze to an enemy, the character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **16%** of their Max HP for **3** turn(s).
612157.desc2: When a character applies Freeze to an enemy, the character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **24%** of their Max HP for **3** turn(s).
612157.shortDesc2: Characters gain a Shield when they apply Freeze on enemies.
612157.battleDesc2: When a character applies Freeze to an enemy, the character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **24%** of their Max HP for **3** turn(s).

612220.name: Nihility
612220.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Nihility, with a **80%** base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear on all enemies for **2** turn(s).
612220.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, there is a high chance of applying Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear on all enemies.
612220.battleDesc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Nihility, with a **80%** base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear on all enemies for **2** turn(s).

612221.name: The Doubtful Fourfold Root
612221.desc: When using Path Resonance, increases the base chance of applying statuses by **100%** and the duration of statuses by 1 turn, and adds 1 stack to all stackable statuses.
612221.shortDesc: When using the Path Resonance, increases the base chance of inflicting status effects, extends the duration of these status effects, and adds to their stacks.
612221.battleDesc: When using Path Resonance, increases the base chance of applying statuses by **100%** and the duration of statuses by 1 turn, and adds 1 stack to all stackable statuses.

612222.name: Suffering and Sunshine
612222.desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Nihility have a **100%** base chance to inflict 2 stacks of **Confusion** and 2 stacks of **Devoid** on all enemies for **2** turn(s).
612222.shortDesc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Nihility have a high chance to apply **Confusion** and **Devoid**.
612222.battleDesc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Nihility have a **100%** base chance to inflict 2 stacks of **Confusion** and 2 stacks of **Devoid** on all enemies for **2** turn(s).

612223.name: Outsider
612223.desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an enemy receives DoT, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **2%** Energy.
612223.shortDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. When an enemy receives DoT, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612223.battleDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an enemy receives DoT, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **2%** Energy.

612224.name: Off the Beaten Track
612224.desc: After using a Path Resonance, for every type of debuff (out of Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear) the enemy target is currently inflicted with, Advance Forward all allies' actions by **4%**.
612224.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, for every type of debuff (out of Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear) the enemy target is currently inflicted with, Advance Forward all allies' actions.

612225.name: White Nights
612225.desc: A character's Basic ATK can cause all DoTs currently applied on the target via Path Resonance: Nihility to immediately deal DMG equivalent to **40%** of these statuses' original DMG.
612225.shortDesc: Basic ATK can additionally trigger the DoT of Path Resonance: Nihility.

612230.name: Funeral of Sensory Pursuivant
612230.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, applies **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion**.
612230.shortDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, apply **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion** on them.
612230.battleDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, applies **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion**.
612230.desc2: Every time an enemy receives DoT, apply **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion**. **Suspicion** stacks will not be reduced.
612230.shortDesc2: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, applies **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion** on the enemy. **Suspicion** stacks cannot be reduced.
612230.battleDesc2: Every time an enemy receives DoT, apply **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion**. **Suspicion** stacks will not be reduced.

612231.name: The Man in the Cover
612231.desc: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT, apply **3** stack(s) of **Suspicion**.
612231.shortDesc: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT state, apply **3** stack(s) of **Suspicion** on them.
612231.battleDesc: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT, apply **3** stack(s) of **Suspicion**.
612231.desc2: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT, apply **3** stack(s) of **Suspicion**. Every time the DoT refreshes, apply **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion**.
612231.shortDesc2: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT state, apply **3** stack(s) of **Suspicion** on them. Every time the DoT countdown timer refreshes, apply **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion** on them.
612231.battleDesc2: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT, apply **3** stack(s) of **Suspicion**. Every time the DoT refreshes, apply **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion**.

612232.name: Why Hasn't Everything Already Disappeared?
612232.desc: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, trigger extra DoT **1** times, dealing DMG equal to **90%** of the original DoT.
612232.shortDesc: At the start of an enemy's turn, all DoT sources on it are triggered **1** extra time(s).
612232.battleDesc: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, trigger extra DoT **1** times, dealing DMG equal to **90%** of the original DoT.
612232.desc2: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, trigger extra DoT **1** times, dealing DMG equal to **135%** of the original DoT.
612232.shortDesc2: At the start of an enemy's turn, all DoT sources on it are triggered **1** extra time(s).
612232.battleDesc2: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, trigger extra DoT **1** times, dealing DMG equal to **135%** of the original DoT.

612240.name: Beginning and End
612240.desc: When an enemy inflicted with **Suspicion** is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of **Suspicion** the defeated enemy has on **1** random enemy target(s).
612240.shortDesc: When an enemy afflicted with **Suspicion** is defeated, transfers the defeated enemy's **Suspicion** stacks to **1** random enemy target(s).
612240.battleDesc: When an enemy inflicted with **Suspicion** is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of **Suspicion** the defeated enemy has on **1** random enemy target(s).
612240.desc2: When an enemy inflicted with **Suspicion** is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of **Suspicion** the defeated enemy has on **2** random enemy target(s).
612240.shortDesc2: When an enemy afflicted with **Suspicion** is defeated, transfers the defeated enemy's **Suspicion** stacks to **2** random enemy target(s).
612240.battleDesc2: When an enemy inflicted with **Suspicion** is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of **Suspicion** the defeated enemy has on **2** random enemy target(s).

612241.name: Café Self-Deceit
612241.desc: When an enemy has **Suspicion** on them, inflicts **1** extra stack(s) of **Suspicion**.
612241.shortDesc: When an enemy becomes afflicted with **Suspicion**, apply **1** extra stack(s) of **Suspicion** on them.
612241.battleDesc: When an enemy has **Suspicion** on them, inflicts **1** extra stack(s) of **Suspicion**.
612241.desc2: When an enemy is inflicted with **Suspicion**, the stacks it gains are doubled.
612241.shortDesc2: When an enemy is afflicted with **Suspicion**, the stacks they gains is doubled.
612241.battleDesc2: When an enemy is inflicted with **Suspicion**, the stacks it gains are doubled.

612242.name: Call of the Wilderness
612242.desc: For every stack of **Suspicion** the enemies have, reduces their ATK by **0%**, up to a max of **30%**.
612242.shortDesc: Decreases the target enemy's ATK based on the total stacks of **Suspicion** on the enemy team.
612242.battleDesc: For every stack of **Suspicion** the enemies have, reduces their ATK by **0%**, up to a max of **30%**.
612242.desc2: For every stack of **Suspicion** the enemies have, reduces their ATK by **0%**, up to a max of **30%**, and reduces their Effect RES by **0%**, up to a max of **30%**.
612242.shortDesc2: Decreases the target enemy's ATK and Effect RES based on the total stacks of **Suspicion** on the enemy team.
612242.battleDesc2: For every stack of **Suspicion** the enemies have, reduces their ATK by **0%**, up to a max of **30%**, and reduces their Effect RES by **0%**, up to a max of **30%**.

612244.name: Hell is Other People
612244.desc: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the same type of Weakness Break effect is applied to enemies adjacent to it.
612244.shortDesc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness Break, enemies adjacent to it will also have their Weaknesses Broken.
612244.battleDesc: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the same type of Weakness Break effect is applied to enemies adjacent to it.
612244.desc2: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the same type of Weakness Break effect is applied to all enemies.
612244.shortDesc2: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness Break, all enemies will also have their Weaknesses Broken.
612244.battleDesc2: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the same type of Weakness Break effect is applied to all enemies.

612245.name: Twilight of Existence
612245.desc: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there is a **75%** base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear on the enemy for **2** turn(s).
612245.shortDesc: If an enemy's Weakness is Broken after receiving an attack, there is a chance for them to be inflicted with a random DoT.
612245.battleDesc: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there is a **75%** base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear on the enemy for **2** turn(s).
612245.desc2: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there is a **75%** base chance to inflict Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear on the enemy for **2** turn(s), and dispels 1 debuff currently on the attacker.
612245.shortDesc2: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there's a chance of inflicting a random DoT and at the same time 1 debuff will be removed from the attacker.
612245.battleDesc2: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there is a **75%** base chance to inflict Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear on the enemy for **2** turn(s), and dispels 1 debuff currently on the attacker.

612246.name: All Things are Possible
612246.desc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to **100%** of the DoT.
612246.shortDesc: If an enemy is under any DoT status when receiving an attack, they will take DMG from a random DoT on them.
612246.battleDesc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to **100%** of the DoT.
612246.desc2: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to **150%** of the DoT.
612246.shortDesc2: If an enemy is under any DoT status when receiving an attack, they will take DMG from a random DoT on them.
612246.battleDesc2: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to **150%** of the DoT.

612250.name: Ignosticism
612250.desc: Gains a **6%** DoT increase for each Nihility Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of **6** time(s).
612250.shortDesc: The more Blessings of Nihility the team has, the higher the characters' DoT becomes.
612250.battleDesc: Gains a **6%** DoT increase for each Nihility Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of **6** time(s).
612250.desc2: Gains a **8%** DoT increase for each Nihility Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of **9** time(s).
612250.shortDesc2: The more Blessings of Nihility the team has, the higher the characters' DoT becomes.
612250.battleDesc2: Gains a **8%** DoT increase for each Nihility Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of **9** time(s).

612253.name: Tragic Lecture
612253.desc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by **10%**.
612253.shortDesc: Enemies take increased DMG from DoTs.
612253.battleDesc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by **10%**.
612253.desc2: Increases DoT taken by enemies by **15%**.
612253.shortDesc2: Enemies take increased DMG from DoTs.
612253.battleDesc2: Increases DoT taken by enemies by **15%**.

612254.name: Sensory Labyrinth
612254.desc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by **1** turn(s).
612254.shortDesc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by **1** turn(s).
612254.battleDesc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by **1** turn(s).
612254.desc2: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by **2** turn(s).
612254.shortDesc2: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by **2** turn(s).
612254.battleDesc2: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by **2** turn(s).

612255.name: Emotional Decluttering
612255.desc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by **3%**. This effect can stack up to **4** time(s).
612255.shortDesc: The more DoTs the enemy has, the more DMG they will receive from all sources.
612255.battleDesc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by **3%**. This effect can stack up to **4** time(s).
612255.desc2: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by **4%**. This effect can stack up to **5** time(s).
612255.shortDesc2: The more DoTs the enemy has, the more DMG they will receive from all sources.
612255.battleDesc2: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by **4%**. This effect can stack up to **5** time(s).

612256.name: Offerings of Deception
612256.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to **1%** of their respective Max HP.
612256.shortDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all characters restore HP.
612256.battleDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to **1%** of their respective Max HP.
612256.desc2: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to **2%** of their respective Max HP.
612256.shortDesc2: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all characters restore HP.
612256.battleDesc2: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to **2%** of their respective Max HP.

612257.name: Before Sunrise
612257.desc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, **2** Energy is regenerated for a random ally.
612257.shortDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, a random ally regenerates Energy.
612257.battleDesc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, **2** Energy is regenerated for a random ally.
612257.desc2: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, **3** Energy is regenerated for a random ally.
612257.shortDesc2: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, a random ally regenerates Energy.
612257.battleDesc2: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, **3** Energy is regenerated for a random ally.

612320.name: Abundance
612320.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Abundance, restore HP for all allies by **50%** of their respective Max HP, and increases their respective Max HP by **15%** for **2** turn(s).
612320.shortDesc: After using Path Resonance, restores all allies' HP and increases their respective Max HP.
612320.battleDesc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Abundance, restore HP for all allies by **50%** of their respective Max HP, and increases their respective Max HP by **15%** for **2** turn(s).

612321.name: Terminal Nirvana
612321.desc: When any ally receives lethal DMG, the Resonance of Path of Abundance prevents them from being knocked down and automatically consumes all Energy to release Path Resonance. This effect can trigger up to **1** time(s) per battle.
612321.shortDesc: When characters receive lethal DMG, they will not be knocked down and will automatically activate Path Resonance (consuming all Energy) instead. This effect can be triggered a limited amount of times per battle.
612321.battleDesc: When any ally receives lethal DMG, the Resonance of Path of Abundance prevents them from being knocked down and automatically consumes all Energy to release Path Resonance. This effect can trigger up to **1** time(s) per battle.

612322.name: Anicca
612322.desc: After releasing a Path Resonance, removes all characters' debuffs and applies **1** stack(s) of **Subduing Evils** for **1** turn(s).
612322.shortDesc: After using the Path Resonance, remove debuffs from all characters and apply **Subduing Evils**.
612322.battleDesc: After releasing a Path Resonance, removes all characters' debuffs and applies **1** stack(s) of **Subduing Evils** for **1** turn(s).

612323.name: Anatta
612323.desc: After Path Resonance Energy is consumed for the first time in battle for the use of Path Resonance, the Path Resonance for Abundance will appear on the action order. The Outgoing Healing provided by this Resonance decreases by **30%**. When this Resonance takes action, it will automatically release Path Resonance to heal allies.
612323.shortDesc: After using Path Resonance for the first time in a battle, Path Resonance: Abundance will appear on the action order.
612323.battleDesc: After Path Resonance Energy is consumed for the first time in battle for the use of Path Resonance, the Path Resonance for Abundance will appear on the action order. The Outgoing Healing provided by this Resonance decreases by **30%**. When this Resonance takes action, it will automatically release Path Resonance to heal allies.

612324.name: First Illuminate the Mountains
612324.desc: After a character has their HP restored via Path Resonance and if the healing amount exceeds the maximum HP, recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger 1 time per Path Resonance use. After triggering this effect, all DMG dealt by all allies is increased by **30%** for **2** turns. This effect can stack up to **2** time(s).
612324.shortDesc: When a Path Resonance overheals, recovers 1 Skill Point and increases all allies' DMG.

612325.name: Nullifying Ardor
612325.desc: After using Path Resonance, all allies' Weakness Break Efficiency increases by **15%** and Break Effect increases by **50%**. This effect lasts for **2** turn(s) and stacks up to **2** time(s).
612325.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, increases all allies' Weakness Break efficiency and Break Effect.

612330.name: Prosperity, Longevity
612330.desc: Charges **Dewdrop** when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to **100%** of the amount of healing received.
612330.shortDesc: When a character's HP is restored, **Dewdrop** is Charged according to the amount of healing received.
612330.battleDesc: Charges **Dewdrop** when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to **100%** of the amount of healing received.
612330.desc2: Charges **Dewdrop** when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to **100%** of the amount of healing received, and increases the DMG of **Dewdrop** by **40%**.
612330.shortDesc2: When a character's HP is restored, **Dewdrop** is Charged according to the amount of healing received, and DMG done by **Dewdrop** is increased.
612330.battleDesc2: Charges **Dewdrop** when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to **100%** of the amount of healing received, and increases the DMG of **Dewdrop** by **40%**.

612331.name: Mudra of Blessing
612331.desc: Charges **Dewdrop** at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to **60%** of their current HP.
612331.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins, **Dewdrop** is Charged based on the character's current HP.
612331.battleDesc: Charges **Dewdrop** at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to **60%** of their current HP.
612331.desc2: Charges **Dewdrop** at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to **70%** of their Max HP.
612331.shortDesc2: When a character's turn begins, **Dewdrop** is Charged based on the character's Max HP.
612331.battleDesc2: Charges **Dewdrop** at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to **70%** of their Max HP.

612332.name: Being of Abundance, Becoming One Mind
612332.desc: When the character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to **30%** of the Outgoing Healing.
612332.shortDesc: Healing effects provided by characters can be Blasted to all allies.
612332.battleDesc: When the character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to **30%** of the Outgoing Healing.
612332.desc2: When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also restore HP equal to **30%** of the amount healed. Increases the ATK of all allies by **15%** of the amount healed, stacking up to no more than **80%** of each ally's respective Base ATK and lasts until the end of the next turn.
612332.shortDesc2: Healing effects provided by characters can be Blasted to all allies and increase ATK based on HP restored.
612332.battleDesc2: When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also restore HP equal to **30%** of the amount healed. Increases the ATK of all allies by **15%** of the amount healed, stacking up to no more than **80%** of each ally's respective Base ATK and lasts until the end of the next turn.

612340.name: Good Deeds Come After Old Sins
612340.desc: Restores HP to the character equal to **20%** of the Charge value when **Dewdrop** ruptures, up to **18%** of the character's Max HP.
612340.shortDesc: Restores the character's HP when **Dewdrop** breaks.
612340.battleDesc: Restores HP to the character equal to **20%** of the Charge value when **Dewdrop** ruptures, up to **18%** of the character's Max HP.
612340.desc2: Restores HP equal to **20%** of the Charge value when **Dewdrop** ruptures, up to **24%** of the character's Max HP and no less than **12%** of their Max HP.
612340.shortDesc2: Restores the character's HP to above a minimum value when **Dewdrop** breaks.

612525.desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, regenerates **5%** Energy for Path Resonance. If the character's current HP percentage is lower than **50%**, additionally regenerates **5%** Energy for Path Resonance.
612525.shortDesc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. If the character's HP is lower than **50%**, increases the amount of Energy regenerated.

612530.name: Non-Inverse Antimatter Equation
612530.desc: If a character's current HP is below **50%**, they are considered to have **16** extra stacks of **Fighting Spirit**.
612530.shortDesc: If a character's current HP is below **50%**, they are considered to have extra stacks of **Fighting Spirit**.
612530.battleDesc: If a character's current HP is below **50%**, they are considered to have **16** extra stacks of **Fighting Spirit**.
612530.desc2: If a character's current HP is below **50%**, they are considered to have **20** extra stacks of **Fighting Spirit**. For every **10%** further HP lost, gains **2** extra stack(s) of **Fighting Spirit**.
612530.shortDesc2: If a character's current HP is below **50%**, they are considered to have extra stacks of **Fighting Spirit**. The lower the character's HP is, the higher the stack becomes.
612530.battleDesc2: If a character's current HP is below **50%**, they are considered to have **20** extra stacks of **Fighting Spirit**. For every **10%** further HP lost, gains **2** extra stack(s) of **Fighting Spirit**.

612531.name: Universal Heat Death Characteristic
612531.desc: When characters are hit or losing HP, they gain **4** stack(s) of **Fighting Spirit**. When the turn ends, the character loses **4** stack(s) of **Fighting Spirit**.
612531.shortDesc: When a character is hit or have their HP lowered, they gain **4** stack(s) of **Fighting Spirit**.
612531.battleDesc: When characters are hit or losing HP, they gain **4** stack(s) of **Fighting Spirit**. When the turn ends, the character loses **4** stack(s) of **Fighting Spirit**.
612531.desc2: When characters are hit or losing HP, the character gains **4** stacks of **Fighting Spirit**, and adjacent allies gain **1** stacks of **Fighting Spirit**. When the turn ends, the character loses **4** stacks of **Fighting Spirit**.
612531.shortDesc2: When a character is hit or have their HP lowered, they gain **4** stack(s) of **Fighting Spirit**, and any adjacent characters gain **1** stack(s) of **Fighting Spirit**.
612531.battleDesc2: When characters are hit or losing HP, the character gains **4** stacks of **Fighting Spirit**, and adjacent allies gain **1** stacks of **Fighting Spirit**. When the turn ends, the character loses **4** stacks of **Fighting Spirit**.

612532.name: Regression Inequality of Annihilation
612532.desc: When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is equally distributed among all allies.
612532.battleDesc: When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is equally distributed among all allies.
612532.desc2: Receives **15%** less DMG. When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is equally distributed among all allies.
612532.shortDesc2: All allies split incoming DMG, and reduces the DMG taken by targeted character.
612532.battleDesc2: Receives **15%** less DMG. When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is equally distributed among all allies.

612540.name: Incremental Doomsday
612540.desc: After being hit, for each stack of **Fighting Spirit** the character has, the character deals Additional DMG equal to **4%** of their ATK to the attacker. This DMG will not be able to defeat the enemy.
612540.shortDesc: After a character is hit, deal Additional DMG to the attacker based on their **Fighting Spirit** stack.
612540.battleDesc: After being hit, for each stack of **Fighting Spirit** the character has, the character deals Additional DMG equal to **4%** of their ATK to the attacker. This DMG will not be able to defeat the enemy.
612540.desc2: After being hit, for each stack of **Fighting Spirit** the character has, the character deals Additional DMG equal to **4%** of their ATK plus **2%** of the current HP loss to the attacker. This DMG will not be able to defeat the enemy.
612540.shortDesc2: After a character is hit, deal Additional DMG to the attacker based on their **Fighting Spirit** stack, and the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP.
612540.battleDesc2: After being hit, for each stack of **Fighting Spirit** the character has, the character deals Additional DMG equal to **4%** of their ATK plus **2%** of the current HP loss to the attacker. This DMG will not be able to defeat the enemy.

612541.name: Catastrophic Resonance
612541.desc: If a character attacks while under **Fighting Spirit**, consumes HP equal to **10%** of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to **60%** of the HP lost.

612541.battleDesc: If a character attacks while under **Fighting Spirit**, consumes HP equal to **10%** of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to **60%** of the HP lost.
612541.desc2: If a character attacks while under **Fighting Spirit**, consumes HP equal to **10%** of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to **60%** of the HP lost. For each stack of **Fighting Spirit**, deals Additional DMG equal to **1%** of the HP lost.

612541.battleDesc2: If a character attacks while under **Fighting Spirit**, consumes HP equal to **10%** of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to **60%** of the HP lost. For each stack of **Fighting Spirit**, deals Additional DMG equal to **1%** of the HP lost.

612542.name: Indicative Depth of Field
612542.desc: For each stack of **Fighting Spirit**, reduces the DMG taken by the character by **1%**.
612542.shortDesc: The higher the **Fighting Spirit** stacks are, the less DMG the character takes.

612542.desc2: For each stack of **Fighting Spirit**, reduces the DMG taken by characters by **1%**. **Fighting Spirit** can stack up to **45** time(s).
612542.shortDesc2: The higher the **Fighting Spirit** stacks are, the less DMG the character takes. **Fighting Spirit** stack limit also increases.
612542.battleDesc2: For each stack of **Fighting Spirit**, reduces the DMG taken by characters by **1%**. **Fighting Spirit** can stack up to **45** time(s).

612543.name: Devastating Accretion

612543.shortDesc: The lower a character's current HP is, the higher their ATK becomes.
612543.battleDesc: For every 1% of the difference between a character's Max HP and current HP, their ATK increases by **1%**.

612543.battleDesc2: For every 1% of a character's Max HP that is lost, their ATK increases by **1%** and DEF by **1%**.

612545.shortDesc2: When a character is hit or have their HP lowered, their HP is restored if their current HP is lower than **35%**. The lower their HP is, the more HP is restored.
612545.battleDesc2: If a character's HP is lower than **35%** when being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by **12%** of their Max HP. The lower the current HP is, the more HP will be restored this way, but no more than **20%**.

612546.battleDesc2: After a character uses their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **25%** of the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP, plus **7%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).

612720.name: Propagation
612720.desc: Consumes **100** Energy to resonate with the Path of Propagation and allows a target ally to immediately take action, recover **2** Skill Point(s) and become affected by **Metamorphosis**. **Metamorphosis** lasts for 1 turn and only takes effect on the latest target.
612720.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, a target ally immediately takes action, recovering **2** Skill Point(s) and activating **Metamorphosis**.
612720.battleDesc: Consumes **100** Energy to resonate with the Path of Propagation and allows a target ally to immediately take action, recover **2** Skill Point(s) and become affected by **Metamorphosis**. **Metamorphosis** lasts for 1 turn and only takes effect on the latest target.

612721.name: Proboscis
612721.desc: Extends the duration of **Metamorphosis** for 1 turn. After a character with **Metamorphosis** defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates **20%** Energy.
612721.shortDesc: The duration of **Metamorphosis** is extended for 1 turn. After a character with **Metamorphosis** defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612721.battleDesc: Extends the duration of **Metamorphosis** for 1 turn. After a character with **Metamorphosis** defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates **20%** Energy.

612722.name: Phenol Compounds
612722.desc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from **100** to **200** points. After a character consumes or recovers Skill Points, additionally regenerates **1%** Energy for Path Resonance.

612722.battleDesc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from **100** to **200** points. After a character consumes or recovers Skill Points, additionally regenerates **1%** Energy for Path Resonance.

612723.name: Crystal Pincers
612723.desc: **Metamorphosis** additionally increases DMG dealt by a character by **40%**. Only when a character is under the **Metamorphosis** effect can they cause **Spores** to burst. Every time a character causes a **Spore** to burst, additionally deal Basic ATK DMG equal to **80%** of the character's ATK. This effect can trigger up to **3** time(s) on the same target.
612723.shortDesc: Increases DMG dealt by characters with **Metamorphosis**. Only this type of character can cause **Spores** to burst, dealing additional DMG after bursting.
612723.battleDesc: **Metamorphosis** additionally increases DMG dealt by a character by **40%**. Only when a character is under the **Metamorphosis** effect can they cause **Spores** to burst. Every time a character causes a **Spore** to burst, additionally deal Basic ATK DMG equal to **80%** of the character's ATK. This effect can trigger up to **3** time(s) on the same target.

612724.name: Superposition Eye
612724.desc: After using Path Resonance, nullifies all DMG received by a single target ally except DoT. This status is dispelled after being attacked. If the target ally's current HP percentage is lower than **50%** when Path Resonance is used, it will additionally recover **1** Skill Point(s).
612724.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, make a target ally able to Block 1 attack. If that ally's HP is lower than **50%**, recover **1** Skill Point(s).

612725.name: Adherent Microbial Mat
612725.desc: When using Path Resonance, a single target ally gain a Shield equal to **60%** of Max HP, lasting for **3** turn(s).
612725.shortDesc: When using a Path Resonance, grants Shield to a target ally.

612730.name: Spore Discharge
612730.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain **1** **Spore(s)**.

612730.desc2: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain **1** **Spores**. When all Skill Points are consumed, the SPD of the character who consumed the last Skill Point increases by **20%** for **2** turn(s).
612730.shortDesc2: When a character consumes Skill Points, causes all enemies to receive **Spores**. If Skill Points are consumed to 0, increases the character's SPD.
612730.battleDesc2: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain **1** **Spores**. When all Skill Points are consumed, the SPD of the character who consumed the last Skill Point increases by **20%** for **2** turn(s).

612731.name: Fungal Pustule
612731.desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 **Spore** to **2** random enemy target(s).
612731.shortDesc: When a character recovers Skill Points, causes a random enemy to receive **Spores**.
612731.battleDesc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 **Spore** to **2** random enemy target(s).
612731.desc2: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 **Spore** to **2** random enemy target(s). The max number of **Spores** that can be possessed increases to **9**.
612731.shortDesc2: When a character recovers Skill Points, causes a random enemy to receive **Spores**. Increases the number of **Spores** they can bear.
612731.battleDesc2: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 **Spore** to **2** random enemy target(s). The max number of **Spores** that can be possessed increases to **9**.

612732.name: Scythe Limbs
612732.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by **40%**. This effect can stack up to **2** time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.
612732.shortDesc: After a character uses an Ultimate, when a Skill Point is consumed, it is considered as additionally consuming 1 Skill Point. The more Skill Points a character consumes, the higher their CRIT DMG.
612732.battleDesc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by **40%**. This effect can stack up to **2** time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.
612732.desc2: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume or recover Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed or recovered. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by **45%**. This effect can stack up to **2** time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.
612732.shortDesc2: After a character uses an Ultimate, when a Skill Point is consumed or recovered, it is considered as additionally consuming or recovering 1 Skill Point. The more Skill Points a character consumes, the higher their CRIT DMG.
612732.battleDesc2: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume or recover Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed or recovered. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by **45%**. This effect can stack up to **2** time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.

612740.shortDesc2: The number of times **Spores** can spread after bursting increases. Can also spread to the original bearer.

612741.name: Lytic Enzyme

612741.desc2: Increases the DMG caused by **Spores** bursting. The DMG increased is equal to **50%** of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the **Spores** they were carrying will spread to other enemy targets.
